About The Company

If you see technology as there to smooth your path in life, our team does too: Your Path, Our Journey.

We believe in people who transform their paths through technology. Technology that connects people who are good at what they do and which practices diversity to create and share those paths that we (as yet!) do not even know about. Our journey is in the smile of every talented person who brings revolution to the world from Brazil - whether with in-app transportation (99), meal delivery (99Food), or digital payments (99Pay).

To make life easier for millions of people every day, we are in the driving seat as part of DiDi Chuxing, the world's largest transport, and convenient platform. And so, we can say, with great pride, that we are pioneers in creating solutions, starting in Brazil, that grow in scale and have positive impacts in a range of other countries.

Whether creating projects from scratch or continually improving our solutions, we like challenges that give us butterflies, and that's why we work with intensity, at a fast pace, with respect, collaboration, and partnership. On this journey, we also create learning and strengthen ourselves in diversity as a fundamental aspect that makes us stand out for our growth day after day.

About The Team/role

If you are looking for a position that will make you learn, as never before, you have come to the right place! We always launching new features and campaigns for our digital wallet linked to the 99 app, 99Pay!

We are looking for a person who is curious and willing to learn about the consumer habits of the digital payments universe to join the payments team.

In this role, you'll be...
Support in research planning, implementation, report preparation and analysis of results generating relevant business insights.
Explore user habits, product perception and competitor movements.
Maintain contact with research vendors.
Support the day-to-day research demanded by other areas, feeding them with information about improvements and new product ideas.
Assist in the day-to-day essential brand research that seeks to understand brand image and UX (application usability).

We're eager to be in touch because you have...
Students enrolled in all courses are expected to graduate between June 2024 and July 2025.
Advanced English.
Data-driven and analytical skills.
Very curious and willing to learn.
Proactive and organized.
Able to manage several themes and demands simultaneously.

You'll love working at DiDi because...

We create user value

We strive to always create valuable experiences for our users in everything we do. Our focus is to always innovate new experiences that are safe, pleasant and efficient.

We are data-driven

We are strong believers in making informed decisions, thats why we are data-driven. We can better navigate the business landscape strategically by analyzing valuable metrics.

Win-win Collaboration

Success is a team sport. When we work to help our partners and colleagues win, we win, too. While keeping everyone's best interest at heart, we communicate with candor and execute with excellence in all we do.

We believe in integrity

Integrity is at the very core of our business. We are people who always want to do the right thing. Our intentions are sincere, we speak our minds and listen to each other.

Growth

We always strive to do better. That means venturing beyond our comfort zones, learning from our mistakes, and helping each other grow.

Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity is one of our biggest strengths. Our differences are what make us distinct. We respect each other and believe in equal opportunities for all.

We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams

At DiDi, we believe that our differences are our biggest source of strength. Thats why we are committed to promoting equal opportunities to all candidates and employees as an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Employment and advancement decisions at DiDi are always made based on the needs of the position and the qualifications of the candidate. We do not discriminate against any employee or applicant based on their gender, age, sexual orientation, nationality, marital status, pregnancy/maternity, disability, race, religion and beliefs, or any other status protected by applicable laws wherever we operate.

We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams, and a workplace that is free from discrimination and harassment, because thats how we create better products and services, make better decisions and better serve the communities were a part of.'

Lean Tech is a fast-growing company located in Medellín, Colombia. We currently have one of the most prominent networks within the entertainment, financial, and logistics industries. Our corporate projections represent hundreds of opportunities for our professionals to grow and boost their careers. Working with us means collaborating with large engineering teams across Latin America and the United States.

We are currently looking for an experienced, dynamic, and highly motivate Data Analyst

The ideal candidate should have strong SQL skills, experience with R/Python (Pandas), and excellent data visualization skills.

Your Duties as a Lean Tech Warrior:

Collect, analyze, and process data using SQL to gain valuable insights and knowledge.
Utilize R/Python (Pandas) to manipulate and transform data, perform statistical analysis, and develop predictive models.
Create clear and impactful data visualizations to communicate findings and trends to internal teams and relevant stakeholders.
Collaborate with internal teams to identify and understand data needs and provide effective solutions.
Manage and prioritize multiple projects and requests, ensuring timely delivery.
Address ad hoc requests and ambiguous tasks, defining their scope and working independently to complete them accurately and within assigned time frames.
Conduct thorough data analysis to identify patterns, trends, and improvement opportunities.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of data analysis processes and practices within the organization.
Why Well Love You:

Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field.
B2 level of English proficiency.
Demonstrable experience using SQL to access, manipulate, and analyze large datasets.
Strong knowledge of R/Python and experience with libraries like Pandas for data analysis.
Experience in creating effective data visualizations using tools such as Tableau or Power BI.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present findings clearly and concisely to different audiences.
Ability to manage multiple projects and requests simultaneously and efficiently prioritize work.
Strong critical thinking and analytical skills to solve complex problems and find effective solutions.
Flexibility and the ability to work in a dynamic environment with tight deadlines.
Previous experience in a similar role as a Data Analyst is preferred but not mandatory.
Values and Attributes

Analytical
Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.
Characteristics

Project Management/Organization Skills
Teamwork/Interpersonal Skills
Communication Skills
Initiative/Creativity/Critical Thinking
Reliability/Accountability

Você é um profissional formado ou não formado e está buscando um por uma experiência que te permita conhecer uma nova cultura, treinar uma nova língua e ainda ser remunerado por isso enquanto viaja?

O programa Talento Global da AIESEC em Brasília, está com vagas abertas para Cientista de dados júnior
>> Esta é uma experiência de intercâmbio profissional - temporário remunerado e presencial na Hungria.
Esta experiência é de longa duração (12 meses) e possui um auxílio de custo de 350000 HUF por mês **Início provável em julho de 2023 - até julho de 2024.

Requisitos:
Ter entre 18 e 30 anos;
Inglês
Microsoft Excel
Ciência de dados
Python
SQL
Disponibilidade para viajar para Hungria no período da experiência.

Empresa:
A SONY é uma grande cooperativa multinacional que garante que nossos produtos, de TVs e câmeras, ganhem vida da maneira mais significativa.

Responsabilidades:
Limpeza de dados
Priorizar e entregar a inclusão de áreas de KPI novas e de melhoria já cobertas
Faça um inventário central dos SLAs existentes, capture as medições de KPI existentes e configure as ausentes
Coleta de dados de todos os tipos de fontes diferentes
Use algoritmos e programação para percorrer com eficiência grandes conjuntos de dados
Garanta a disponibilidade de relatórios de KPI

Carga horária:
Segunda a Sexta, 09h00 - 17h00

Benefícios:
Um computador será fornecido.
Seja certificado como participante do Talento Global;
Desenvolva um conjunto de qualidades de liderança através do nosso Modelo de Desenvolvimento de Liderança;
Obtenha suporte pessoal e profissional do escritório local da AIESEC e do escritório da AIESEC no exterior;
Aumente suas perspectivas de carreira com a oportunidade de trabalhar como estagiário no exterior.

Por que trabalhar na Rentcars?
Somos a Rentcars, a maior plataforma de locação de veículos da América Latina e um dos maiores players mundiais do setor. Desde 2009, levamos a sério a missão de conectar nossos clientes às melhores opções de carros para alugar.
Hoje, oferecemos cobertura em mais de 160 países, somos parceiros das melhores e maiores locadoras de carros do mundo, em mais de 5 mil cidades e 20 mil pontos de retirada de carro em todo mundo.
Com sedes em Curitiba e Amsterdã, somos globais e focados em excelência e inovação. Afinal, nós amamos o que fazemos!!
E não para por aí, somos um Great Place to Work®, Empresa Cidadã e certificados pelo B-Corp, o que reforça nosso compromisso com a sustentabilidade, diversidade e cuidado com nossos Renties, que é como chamamos os nossos colaboradores.
Quer trabalhar em uma empresa com o selo B-corp, certificada e rankeada pelo GPTW® e que também está entre as mais amadas do Brasil, de acordo com o Glassdoor?
Se você é alguém que procura uma empresa desafiadora, moderna, de abrangência mundial e que está pronto para assumir o protagonismo da sua carreira, esse pode ser o seu lugar. Aqui você irá se envolver em inúmeras demandas de diversas áreas da empresa, irá conduzi-las por si só ou em equipe e precisará assumir o papel de referência do time, apoiando os demais integrantes rumo ao crescimento profissional e aprofundamento técnico. Queremos você, que se considera pronto para mergulhar em um negócio complexo, envolvente e que nos entrega desafios constantes. Queremos você, que é capaz de se debruçar em dados, entendê-los e extrair valor. Somos data-driven e queremos que você nos ajude ainda mais neste caminho!

Nesta posição você ficará responsável por:
Conduzir novas iniciativas de projetos de dados (relatórios, dashboards, integrações, análises, etc) de ponta a ponta, traduzindo reuniões de negócio em projetos analíticos, elaborando documentação de requisitos, acompanhando e suportando o time de desenvolvimento, além de manter os envolvidos informados da situação do projeto;
Desenvolver visualizações complexas em Tableau que transmitam ao cliente os insights necessários para uma boa condução do negócio;
Analisar alto volume de dados e apresentar análises detalhadas que impactem positivamente diversas áreas áreas da empresa;
Proativamente identificar oportunidades e/ou gaps nos processos e resultados a fim de alavancar os resultados alcançados;
Ter entendimento aprofundado do negócio para apoiar as áreas de negócio em eventuais dúvidas que possam surgir em relação aos nossos produtos entregues;
Apoiar o time no desenvolvimento das competências técnicas necessárias para área, tais como SQL, Tableau, modelagem dimensional e conceitos de Data Warehouse.

O que esperamos de você (experiências, soft e hard skills):
SQL e Tableau avançados;
Modelagem dimensional e Data Warehouse;
Forte capacidade analítica e entendimento do negócio;
Grande experiência em encontrar insights em alto volume de dados de forma a fazer recomendações às áreas de negócio;
Python para criação de scripts para análises pontuais, tarefas agendadas e entendimento de processos legados;
Três anos de experiência na área;
Graduação em Ciência da Computação, Sistemas de Informação, Gestão da Informação, Engenharia e cursos afins;
Perfil estratégico, autônomo, proativo, flexível, comunicador;

O que pode ser um diferencial:
Vivência e entendimento de pipeline de dados baseados em tecnologia AWS (entendimento geral do conceito e consumo de informações disponibilizadas por essas estruturas);
Vivência em metodologias ágeis;
Vivência em Google Analytics;
Inglês intermediário.

E o que você ganha ao fazer parte da Rentcars.com (além de trabalhar em uma empresa incrível, com pessoas mais incríveis ainda):
Benefícios flexíveis: Serão 7 benefícios com 4 opções cada. Você escolhe o benefício que te atende melhor e faz mais sentido para você!
Plano de saúde Unimed sem mensalidades para titular e dependentes para o plano de enfermaria;
Seguro de vida sem descontos;
Plano odontológico (Metlife); podendo incluir dependentes com contributariedade;
Vale-refeição ou vale-alimentação sem descontos (R$31,33 por dia trabalhado);
Gympass para se exercitar e movimentar o corpo;
Meu Pet Club, (plano para seu Pet), porque seus amigos de 4 patas merecem o melhor;
Previdência Pulpa, para quem quer pensar e garantir o futuro dos filhos;
MBO - Management by Objectives: Bônus anual atrelado à metas;
Vale-transporte (Desconto de 3%);
Good Card, cartão de crédito com desconto em folha de pagamento;
Rentie Scholarship - Subsídio parcial de estudos para graduação, pós-graduação, idiomas e certificações;
RentClub: Clube de benefícios com descontos exclusivos;
RentieHunter: Programa interno de indicações.
Kit Onboarding para os Newbies (nossos novos colaboradores);
Kit Maternidade para os RentieBabys;
Licença maternidade estendida, mais tempo para nossas Renties passarem com os RentieBabys;
Frutas fresquinhas todos os dias;
Máquina de café e chá à disposição;
Conveniência Uneed;
Sem Dress Code;
Day Off de aniversário;
Espaços de descompressão no office com sinuca, videogame, e etc para você relaxar e descansar;
PitStops e Cozinha equipadas com microondas e geladeiras
Ferramenta de apoio para o seu desenvolvimento;
SmartUps e Rentclasses, para se desenvolver e aprender;
Learning Rocks, cursos à sua disposição para assistir e aprender quando quiser;
Happy hours e celebrações;
Tudo isso e muito mais!!!

Gostou? Inscreva-se agora e venha fazer a diferença conosco! Boa sorte!

RENTCARS WITHOUT BARRIERS

Job Purpose and Impact

The Analytics Visualisation Analyst will develop an in depth understanding of the business to innovate significant data driven insights to help business leaders make better decisions and will develop and combine subject matter expertise in key data domains. In this role, you will act as a partner with internal stakeholders and technical staff to execute a business technology strategy that delivers reporting and analytics solutions.

You will be designing and building these strategic and actionable insights utilizing the comprehensive visual analytics capabilities, connecting to the underlying data models in our Big Data Platform. In this role, you will act as an authority for key metrics and KPIâs, data lineage, access, visualizations, and storytelling across functions and regions. The insights will drive value for the Cargill FIBI business and help the business make fact-based decisions, and become an insight driven organization.

We are looking for a candidate with proven data analytics experience utilizing data analysis methodologies and tools to increase efficiency and effectiveness. This role requires strong technical skills, curiosity to learn new business processes, a creative mindset, critical thinking, and interpersonal skills.

Key Accountabilities
Identify and analyze business needs, gather requirements and define the scope and objectives to drive business decisions.

Lead analysis in collaboration with process and operations leadership to identify the top opportunities for improvement and track progress and impact on future results.
Mentor and coach peers and recommend process improvements related to delivery and new methodologies.
Partner with the team to develop a detailed understanding of the business and offer mentorship or technical solutions to identify business problems.
You will work under minimal supervision and independently handle complex issues while referring only the most complex issues to higher-level staff.

About The Company

If you see technology as there to smooth your path in life, our team does too: Your Path, Our Journey.

We believe in people who transform their paths through technology. Technology that connects people who are good at what they do and which practices diversity to create and share those paths that we (as yet!) do not even know about. Our journey is in the smile of every talented person who brings revolution to the world from Brazil - whether with in-app transportation (99), meal delivery (99Food), or digital payments (99Pay).

To make life easier for millions of people every day, we are in the driving seat as part of DiDi Chuxing, the world's largest transport, and convenient platform. And so, we can say, with great pride, that we are pioneers in creating solutions, starting in Brazil, that grow in scale and have positive impacts in a range of other countries.

Job Purpose and Impact

The Analytics Visualisation Analyst will develop an in depth understanding of the business to innovate significant data driven insights to help business leaders make better decisions and will develop and combine subject matter expertise in key data domains. In this role, you will act as a partner with internal stakeholders and technical staff to execute a business technology strategy that delivers reporting and analytics solutions.

You will be designing and building these strategic and actionable insights utilizing the comprehensive visual analytics capabilities, connecting to the underlying data models in our Big Data Platform. About The Company

If you see technology as there to smooth your path in life, our team does too: Your Path, Our Journey.

We believe in people who transform their paths through technology. Technology that connects people who are good at what they do and which practices diversity to create and share those paths that we (as yet!) do not even know about. Our journey is in the smile of every talented person who brings revolution to the world from Brazil - whether with in-app transportation (99), meal delivery (99Food), or digital payments (99Pay).

To make life easier for millions of people every day, we are in the driving seat as part of DiDi Chuxing, the world's largest transport, and convenient platform. And so, we can say, with great pride, that we are pioneers in creating solutions, starting in Brazil, that grow in scale and have positive impacts in a range of other countries.

Whether creating projects from scratch or continually improving our solutions, we like challenges that give us butterflies, and that's why we work with intensity, at a fast pace, with respect, collaboration, and partnership. On this journey, we also create learning and strengthen ourselves in diversity as a fundamental aspect that makes us stand out for our growth day after day.

About The Team/role

If you are looking for a position that will make you learn, as never before, you have come to the right place! We always launching new features and campaigns for our digital wallet linked to the 99 app, 99Pay!

We are looking for a person who is curious and willing to learn about the consumer habits of the digital payments universe to join the payments team.

In this role, you'll be...
Support in research planning, implementation, report preparation and analysis of results generating relevant business insights.
Explore user habits, product perception and competitor movements.
Maintain contact with research vendors.
Support the day-to-day research demanded by other areas, feeding them with information about improvements and new product ideas.
Assist in the day-to-day essential brand research that seeks to understand brand image and UX (application usability).

We're eager to be in touch because you have...
Students enrolled in all courses are expected to graduate between June 2024 and July 2025.
Advanced English.
Data-driven and analytical skills.
Very curious and willing to learn.
Proactive and organized.
Able to manage several themes and demands simultaneously.

You'll love working at DiDi because...

We create user value

We strive to always create valuable experiences for our users in everything we do. Our focus is to always innovate new experiences that are safe, pleasant and efficient.

We are data-driven

We are strong believers in making informed decisions, thatâs why we are data-driven. We can better navigate the business landscape strategically by analyzing valuable metrics.

Win-win Collaboration

Success is a team sport. When we work to help our partners and colleagues win, we win, too. While keeping everyone's best interest at heart, we communicate with candor and execute with excellence in all we do.

We believe in integrity

Integrity is at the very core of our business. We are people who always want to do the right thing. Our intentions are sincere, we speak our minds and listen to each other.

Growth

We always strive to do better. That means venturing beyond our comfort zones, learning from our mistakes, and helping each other grow.

Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity is one of our biggest strengths. Our differences are what make us distinct. We respect each other and believe in equal opportunities for all.

We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams

At DiDi, we believe that our differences are our biggest source of strength. Thatâs why we are committed to promoting equal opportunities to all candidates and employees as an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Employment and advancement decisions at DiDi are always made based on the needs of the position and the qualifications of the candidate. We do not discriminate against any employee or applicant based on their gender, age, sexual orientation, nationality, marital status, pregnancy/maternity, disability, race, religion and beliefs, or any other status protected by applicable laws wherever we operate.

About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,â¯enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to know our team:

The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda has deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and has built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.

Due to continued expansion, there are multiple analyst roles within the marketing team across different marketing channels. While the scope will vary depending on these channels, here are some examples:

Experimentation and optimizing campaign performance: Experiment with ads/campaign structures and bidding& pricing strategies on partners such as Google, Bing, TripAdvisor, Trivago, and other search engines. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests.
Modeling: Analyze vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop predictive models using data science techniques (e.g. understanding the impact on bookings from large-scale TV campaigns or demand elasticity from pricing optimization), and liaise with product teams on an implementation roadmap
Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, understand growth levers, and communicate recommendations via presentations to stakeholders

What youâll Need to Succeed:

Bachelorâs degree or higher from top university in a quantitative subject e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering business, science, or relevant field of study
0 to 4 years experience in data crunching from top-tier consulting, investment banking, private equity or strategy/business role for a fast-growing global tech company
Experience in one or more data analysis packages or databases, e.g., SQL, SAS, R, SPSS, Python, VBA and visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, Power BI, etc.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Ability to move fast and be efficient, making decisions on objective data evidence
Innate desire to take ownership, make an impact and influence outcomes
Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to work independently

Itâs great if you have:

Experience in digital marketing or e-commerce
Experience with A/B testing and other testing metrics
Strong presentation and negotiation skills

About Indigo

Indigo Ag is a mission-driven company dedicated to leveraging science and technology to help improve the sustainability and profitability of the agriculture industry. Since 2013, we have pursued innovative ways for science and technology to drive sustainability and profitability in agriculture. With our mission, we are focused on four key principles:
Helping farmers enhance their profitability and soil health
Improving the quantity, quality, and traceability of the food available to consumers
Protecting the environment by reducing and removing harmful greenhouse gases from the atmosphere, while incentivizing sustainable land stewardship practices
Creating long-term value for our shareholders

Our people build partnerships, explore the science, and engineer the technology to help grow the future of sustainable agriculture. The only way to achieve it is through a unique combination of expertise â from Fortune 500 to academia, soil science and agriculture, to tech start-ups.

Want to build a stronger, more sustainable future and cultivate your career? Join Cargill's global team of 160,000 employees who are committed to safe, responsible and sustainable ways to nourish the world. This position is in Cargillâs food ingredients and bio-industrial business, where we anticipate trends around taste, nutrition and safety to innovate and provide solutions to manufacturers, retailers and foodservice companies.

Job Purpose and Impact

The Analytics Visualisation Analyst will develop an in depth understanding of the business to innovate significant data driven insights to help business leaders make better decisions and will develop and combine subject matter expertise in key data domains. In this role, you will act as a partner with internal stakeholders and technical staff to execute a business technology strategy that delivers reporting and analytics solutions.

You will be designing and building these strategic and actionable insights utilizing the comprehensive visual analytics capabilities, connecting to the underlying data models in our Big Data Platform. In this role, you will act as an authority for key metrics and KPIâs, data lineage, access, visualizations, and storytelling across functions and regions. The insights will drive value for the Cargill FIBI business and help the business make fact-based decisions, and become an insight driven organization.

We are looking for a candidate with proven data analytics experience utilizing data analysis methodologies and tools to increase efficiency and effectiveness. This role requires strong technical skills, curiosity to learn new business processes, a creative mindset, critical thinking, and interpersonal skills.

Key Accountabilities
Identify and analyze business needs, gather requirements and define the scope and objectives to drive business decisions.
Prepare data and explore new potential data to support reporting and analysis initiatives.
Prepare reports and analysis to identify, analyze and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets for values and new opportunities.
Lead analysis in collaboration with process and operations leadership to identify the top opportunities for improvement and track progress and impact on future results.
Mentor and coach peers and recommend process improvements related to delivery and new methodologies.
Partner with the team to develop a detailed understanding of the business and offer mentorship or technical solutions to identify business problems.
You will work under minimal supervision and independently handle complex issues while referring only the most complex issues to higher-level staff.
Build prototypes to test new concepts and be a key contributor of ideas that improve fact-based decision making, (advanced) analytics, and key performance metrics.
Other duties as assigned

Qualifications

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelorâs degree in a related field or equivalent experience
Minimum of four years of related work experience
Business acumen and the ability to partner and communicate effectively with business counterparts
3+ years applied experience in working with Visual Analytics Platforms like Tableau and/or PowerBI
2+ years applied experience in optimizing performance of dashboards (front-end) to accommodate for non-functional requirements
Supported and enabled management information and business intelligence strategy
Applied experience with UI/UX concepts and story-telling through data
Applied experience with data process mapping and business analysis
Fluent English is mandatory

Preferred Qualifications
Certification in programming language or business intelligence tools
Confirmed skills querying relational databases with query language
Confirmed experience working with large data stores
Applied experience with Data Warehousing concepts (e.g. dimensional modelling) and the use of traditional RDBMS;
Experience with the Agile mindset
Experience with Alteryx, Tableau Prep and/or KNIME
Experience with SAP Business Objects

About The Company

If you see technology as there to smooth your path in life, our team does too: Your Path, Our Journey.

We believe in people who transform their paths through technology. Technology that connects people who are good at what they do and which practices diversity to create and share those paths that we (as yet!) do not even know about. Our journey is in the smile of every talented person who brings revolution to the world from Brazil - whether with in-app transportation (99), meal delivery (99Food), or digital payments (99Pay).

To make life easier for millions of people every day, we are in the driving seat as part of DiDi Chuxing, the world's largest transport, and convenient platform. And so, we can say, with great pride, that we are pioneers in creating solutions, starting in Brazil, that grow in scale and have positive impacts in a range of other countries.

Whether creating projects from scratch or continually improving our solutions, we like challenges that give us butterflies, and that's why we work with intensity, at a fast pace, with respect, collaboration, and partnership. On this journey, we also create learning and strengthen ourselves in diversity as a fundamental aspect that makes us stand out for our growth day after day.

About The Team/role

If you are looking for a position that will make you learn, as never before, you have come to the right place! We always launching new features and campaigns for our digital wallet linked to the 99 app, 99Pay!

We are looking for a person who is curious and willing to learn about the consumer habits of the digital payments universe to join the payments team.

In this role, you'll be...
Support in research planning, implementation, report preparation and analysis of results generating relevant business insights.
Explore user habits, product perception and competitor movements.
Maintain contact with research vendors.
Support the day-to-day research demanded by other areas, feeding them with information about improvements and new product ideas.
Assist in the day-to-day essential brand research that seeks to understand brand image and UX (application usability).

We're eager to be in touch because you have...
Students enrolled in all courses are expected to graduate between June 2024 and July 2025.
Advanced English.
Data-driven and analytical skills.
Very curious and willing to learn.
Proactive and organized.
Able to manage several themes and demands simultaneously.

We believe in integrity

Integrity is at the very core of our business. We are people who always want to do the right thing. Our intentions are sincere, we speak our minds and listen to each other.

Growth

We always strive to do better. That means venturing beyond our comfort zones, learning from our mistakes, and helping each other grow.

Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity is one of our biggest strengths. Our differences are what make us distinct. We respect each other and believe in equal opportunities for all.

We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams

About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,â¯enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to know our team:

The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda has deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and has built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.

Due to continued expansion, there are multiple analyst roles within the marketing team across different marketing channels. While the scope will vary depending on these channels, here are some examples:

Experimentation and optimizing campaign performance: Experiment with ads/campaign structures and bidding& pricing strategies on partners such as Google, Bing, TripAdvisor, Trivago, and other search engines. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests.
Modeling: Analyze vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop predictive models using data science techniques (e.g. understanding the impact on bookings from large-scale TV campaigns or demand elasticity from pricing optimization), and liaise with product teams on an implementation roadmap
Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, understand growth levers, and communicate recommendations via presentations to stakeholders

What youâll Need to Succeed:

Bachelorâs degree or higher from top university in a quantitative subject e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering business, science, or relevant field of study
0 to 4 years experience in data crunching from top-tier consulting, investment banking, private equity or strategy/business role for a fast-growing global tech company
Experience in one or more data analysis packages or databases, e.g., SQL, SAS, R, SPSS, Python, VBA and visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, Power BI, etc.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Ability to move fast and be efficient, making decisions on objective data evidence
Innate desire to take ownership, make an impact and influence outcomes
Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to work independently

Itâs great if you have:

Experience in digital marketing or e-commerce
Experience with A/B testing and other testing metrics
Strong presentation and negotiation skills

Job Purpose and Impact

The Analytics Visualisation Analyst will develop an in depth understanding of the business to innovate significant data driven insights to help business leaders make better decisions and will develop and combine subject matter expertise in key data domains. In this role, you will act as a partner with internal stakeholders and technical staff to execute a business technology strategy that delivers reporting and analytics solutions.

You will be designing and building these strategic and actionable insights utilizing the comprehensive visual analytics capabilities, connecting to the underlying data models in our Big Data Platform. About The Company

If you see technology as there to smooth your path in life, our team does too: Your Path, Our Journey.

We believe in people who transform their paths through technology. Technology that connects people who are good at what they do and which practices diversity to create and share those paths that we (as yet!) do not even know about. Our journey is in the smile of every talented person who brings revolution to the world from Brazil - whether with in-app transportation (99), meal delivery (99Food), or digital payments (99Pay).

To make life easier for millions of people every day, we are in the driving seat as part of DiDi Chuxing, the world's largest transport, and convenient platform. And so, we can say, with great pride, that we are pioneers in creating solutions, starting in Brazil, that grow in scale and have positive impacts in a range of other countries.

Whether creating projects from scratch or continually improving our solutions, we like challenges that give us butterflies, and that's why we work with intensity, at a fast pace, with respect, collaboration, and partnership. On this journey, we also create learning and strengthen ourselves in diversity as a fundamental aspect that makes us stand out for our growth day after day.

About The Team/role

If you are looking for a position that will make you learn, as never before, you have come to the right place! We always launching new features and campaigns for our digital wallet linked to the 99 app, 99Pay!

We are looking for a person who is curious and willing to learn about the consumer habits of the digital payments universe to join the payments team.

In this role, you'll be...
Support in research planning, implementation, report preparation and analysis of results generating relevant business insights.
Explore user habits, product perception and competitor movements.
Maintain contact with research vendors.
Support the day-to-day research demanded by other areas, feeding them with information about improvements and new product ideas.
Assist in the day-to-day essential brand research that seeks to understand brand image and UX (application usability).

We're eager to be in touch because you have...
Students enrolled in all courses are expected to graduate between June 2024 and July 2025.
Advanced English.
Data-driven and analytical skills.
Very curious and willing to learn.
Proactive and organized.
Able to manage several themes and demands simultaneously.

You'll love working at DiDi because...

We create user value

We strive to always create valuable experiences for our users in everything we do. Our focus is to always innovate new experiences that are safe, pleasant and efficient.

We are data-driven

We are strong believers in making informed decisions, thatâs why we are data-driven. We can better navigate the business landscape strategically by analyzing valuable metrics.

Win-win Collaboration

Success is a team sport. When we work to help our partners and colleagues win, we win, too. While keeping everyone's best interest at heart, we communicate with candor and execute with excellence in all we do.

We believe in integrity

Integrity is at the very core of our business. We are people who always want to do the right thing. Our intentions are sincere, we speak our minds and listen to each other.

Growth

We always strive to do better. That means venturing beyond our comfort zones, learning from our mistakes, and helping each other grow.

Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity is one of our biggest strengths. Our differences are what make us distinct. We respect each other and believe in equal opportunities for all.

We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams

At DiDi, we believe that our differences are our biggest source of strength. Thatâs why we are committed to promoting equal opportunities to all candidates and employees as an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Employment and advancement decisions at DiDi are always made based on the needs of the position and the qualifications of the candidate. We do not discriminate against any employee or applicant based on their gender, age, sexual orientation, nationality, marital status, pregnancy/maternity, disability, race, religion and beliefs, or any other status protected by applicable laws wherever we operate.

We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams, and a workplace that is free from discrimination and harassment, because thatâs how we create better products and services, make better decisions and better serve the communities weâre a part of.'

About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,â¯enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to know our team:

The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda has deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and has built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.

Due to continued expansion, there are multiple analyst roles within the marketing team across different marketing channels. While the scope will vary depending on these channels, here are some examples:

Experimentation and optimizing campaign performance: Experiment with ads/campaign structures and bidding& pricing strategies on partners such as Google, Bing, TripAdvisor, Trivago, and other search engines. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests.
Modeling: Analyze vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop predictive models using data science techniques (e.g. understanding the impact on bookings from large-scale TV campaigns or demand elasticity from pricing optimization), and liaise with product teams on an implementation roadmap
Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, understand growth levers, and communicate recommendations via presentations to stakeholders

What youâll Need to Succeed:

Bachelorâs degree or higher from top university in a quantitative subject e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering business, science, or relevant field of study
0 to 4 years experience in data crunching from top-tier consulting, investment banking, private equity or strategy/business role for a fast-growing global tech company
Experience in one or more data analysis packages or databases, e.g., SQL, SAS, R, SPSS, Python, VBA and visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, Power BI, etc.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Ability to move fast and be efficient, making decisions on objective data evidence
Innate desire to take ownership, make an impact and influence outcomes
Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to work independently

Itâs great if you have:

Experience in digital marketing or e-commerce
Experience with A/B testing and other testing metrics
Strong presentation and negotiation skills

At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a personâs merit and qualifications. Want to build a stronger, more sustainable future and cultivate your career? Join Cargill's global team of 160,000 employees who are committed to safe, responsible and sustainable ways to nourish the world. This position is in Cargillâs food ingredients and bio-industrial business, where we anticipate trends around taste, nutrition and safety to innovate and provide solutions to manufacturers, retailers and foodservice companies.

Job Purpose and Impact

The Analytics Visualisation Analyst will develop an in depth understanding of the business to innovate significant data driven insights to help business leaders make better decisions and will develop and combine subject matter expertise in key data domains. In this role, you will act as a partner with internal stakeholders and technical staff to execute a business technology strategy that delivers reporting and analytics solutions.

You will be designing and building these strategic and actionable insights utilizing the comprehensive visual analytics capabilities, connecting to the underlying data models in our Big Data Platform. In this role, you will act as an authority for key metrics and KPIâs, data lineage, access, visualizations, and storytelling across functions and regions. The insights will drive value for the Cargill FIBI business and help the business make fact-based decisions, and become an insight driven organization.

We are looking for a candidate with proven data analytics experience utilizing data analysis methodologies and tools to increase efficiency and effectiveness. This role requires strong technical skills, curiosity to learn new business processes, a creative mindset, critical thinking, and interpersonal skills.

Key Accountabilities
Identify and analyze business needs, gather requirements and define the scope and objectives to drive business decisions.
Prepare data and explore new potential data to support reporting and analysis initiatives.
Prepare reports and analysis to identify, analyze and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets for values and new opportunities.
Lead analysis in collaboration with process and operations leadership to identify the top opportunities for improvement and track progress and impact on future results.
Mentor and coach peers and recommend process improvements related to delivery and new methodologies.
Partner with the team to develop a detailed understanding of the business and offer mentorship or technical solutions to identify business problems.
You will work under minimal supervision and independently handle complex issues while referring only the most complex issues to higher-level staff.
Build prototypes to test new concepts and be a key contributor of ideas that improve fact-based decision making, (advanced) analytics, and key performance metrics.
Other duties as assigned

About The Company

If you see technology as there to smooth your path in life, our team does too: Your Path, Our Journey.

We believe in people who transform their paths through technology. Technology that connects people who are good at what they do and which practices diversity to create and share those paths that we (as yet!) do not even know about. Our journey is in the smile of every talented person who brings revolution to the world from Brazil - whether with in-app transportation (99), meal delivery (99Food), or digital payments (99Pay).

To make life easier for millions of people every day, we are in the driving seat as part of DiDi Chuxing, the world's largest transport, and convenient platform. And so, we can say, with great pride, that we are pioneers in creating solutions, starting in Brazil, that grow in scale and have positive impacts in a range of other countries.

Whether creating projects from scratch or continually improving our solutions, we like challenges that give us butterflies, and that's why we work with intensity, at a fast pace, with respect, collaboration, and partnership. On this journey, we also create learning and strengthen ourselves in diversity as a fundamental aspect that makes us stand out for our growth day after day.

About The Team/role

If you are looking for a position that will make you learn, as never before, you have come to the right place! We always launching new features and campaigns for our digital wallet linked to the 99 app, 99Pay!

We are looking for a person who is curious and willing to learn about the consumer habits of the digital payments universe to join the payments team.

In this role, you'll be...
Support in research planning, implementation, report preparation and analysis of results generating relevant business insights.
Explore user habits, product perception and competitor movements.
Maintain contact with research vendors.
Support the day-to-day research demanded by other areas, feeding them with information about improvements and new product ideas.
Assist in the day-to-day essential brand research that seeks to understand brand image and UX (application usability).

We're eager to be in touch because you have...
Students enrolled in all courses are expected to graduate between June 2024 and July 2025.
Advanced English.
Data-driven and analytical skills.
Very curious and willing to learn.
Proactive and organized.
Able to manage several themes and demands simultaneously.

You'll love working at DiDi because...

We create user value

We strive to always create valuable experiences for our users in everything we do. Our focus is to always innovate new experiences that are safe, pleasant and efficient.

We are data-driven

We are strong believers in making informed decisions, thatâs why we are data-driven. We can better navigate the business landscape strategically by analyzing valuable metrics.

Win-win Collaboration

Success is a team sport. When we work to help our partners and colleagues win, we win, too. While keeping everyone's best interest at heart, we communicate with candor and execute with excellence in all we do.

We believe in integrity

Integrity is at the very core of our business. We are people who always want to do the right thing. Our intentions are sincere, we speak our minds and listen to each other.

Growth

We always strive to do better. That means venturing beyond our comfort zones, learning from our mistakes, and helping each other grow.

Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity is one of our biggest strengths. Our differences are what make us distinct. We respect each other and believe in equal opportunities for all.

We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams

At DiDi, we believe that our differences are our biggest source of strength. Thatâs why we are committed to promoting equal opportunities to all candidates and employees as an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Employment and advancement decisions at DiDi are always made based on the needs of the position and the qualifications of the candidate. We do not discriminate against any employee or applicant based on their gender, age, sexual orientation, nationality, marital status, pregnancy/maternity, disability, race, religion and beliefs, or any other status protected by applicable laws wherever we operate.

We are committed to building inclusive and diverse teams, and a workplace that is free from discrimination and harassment, because thatâs how we create better products and services, make better decisions and better serve the communities weâre a part of.'

About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,â¯enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to know our team:

The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda has deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and has built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.

Due to continued expansion, there are multiple analyst roles within the marketing team across different marketing channels. While the scope will vary depending on these channels, here are some examples:

Experimentation and optimizing campaign performance: Experiment with ads/campaign structures and bidding& pricing strategies on partners such as Google, Bing, TripAdvisor, Trivago, and other search engines. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests.
Modeling: Analyze vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop predictive models using data science techniques (e.g. understanding the impact on bookings from large-scale TV campaigns or demand elasticity from pricing optimization), and liaise with product teams on an implementation roadmap
Reporting, analysis, and insights: Building dashboards to track performance, derive insights, understand growth levers, and communicate recommendations via presentations to stakeholders

What youâll Need to Succeed:

Bachelorâs degree or higher from top university in a quantitative subject e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering business, science, or relevant field of study
0 to 4 years experience in data crunching from top-tier consulting, investment banking, private equity or strategy/business role for a fast-growing global tech company
Experience in one or more data analysis packages or databases, e.g., SQL, SAS, R, SPSS, Python, VBA and visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, Power BI, etc.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Ability to move fast and be efficient, making decisions on objective data evidence
Innate desire to take ownership, make an impact and influence outcomes
Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to work independently

Itâs great if you have:

Experience in digital marketing or e-commerce
Experience with A/B testing and other testing metrics
Strong presentation and negotiation skills

About Indigo

Indigo Ag is a mission-driven company dedicated to leveraging science and technology to help improve the sustainability and profitability of the agriculture industry. Since 2013, we have pursued innovative ways for science and technology to drive sustainability and profitability in agriculture. With our mission, we are focused on four key principles:
Helping farmers enhance their profitability and soil health
Improving the quantity, quality, and traceability of the food available to consumers
Protecting the environment by reducing and removing harmful greenhouse gases from the atmosphere, while incentivizing sustainable land stewardship practices
Creating long-term value for our shareholders

Our people build partnerships, explore the science, and engineer the technology to help grow the future of sustainable agriculture. The only way to achieve it is through a unique combination of expertise â from Fortune 500 to academia, soil science and agriculture, to tech start-ups.
